channel.title: download warnings
channel.description: i believe in the download page there should be a warning when somebody attempts to download for windows or virtualbox, something along lines of "please read this" and it would redirect them to a whonix wiki page on windows host issues that can make whonix useless as well as virtualbox closed source nature

item.title: download warnings
item.dc:creator: quantum445
item.description:
i believe in the download page there should be a warning when somebody attempts to download for windows or virtualbox, something along lines of “please read this” and it would redirect them to a whonix wiki page on windows host issues that can make whonix useless as well as virtualbox closed source nature
